column4: This element describes all of the features of a single (conceptual)variable in a social science data file.
The definition of the conceptual variable.
The ID of the conceptual variable.
The related object type for the conceptual variable.
Valid from date provided by the metadata distributor.
Version number of the conceptual variable provided by the metadata distributor.
Person or organization responsible for the version change.
Id to uniquely identify the variable.
Extra information related to the definition of the variable.
URN of the Question Item that is used as variable.
Information about how the variable was processed.
